title: Towards a More Sustainable Diets
info: Greenhouse gases are responsible for the greenhouse effect, which ultimately known to leads to global warming. Agriculture accounts for roughly a quarter of all greenhouse gas emissions, much of them produced by industrial livestock production at factory farms. An industrialized factory farm is a farm on which large numbers of livestock are raised indoors in conditions intended to maximize production at minimal cost.
